name: restringer
description: Deobfuscate Javascript with emphasis on reconstructing strings

scripts.test:quick: node --test --trace-warnings --no-node-snapshot tests/functionality.test.js tests/modules.*.test.js tests/processors.test.js tests/utils.test.js tests/deobfuscation.test.js
scripts.test:quick:watch: node --test --trace-warnings --no-node-snapshot --watch tests/functionality.test.js tests/modules.*.test.js tests/processors.test.js tests/utils.test.js tests/deobfuscation.test.js

author: Ben Baryo (ben.baryo@humansecurity.com)
